message.content:
cs.HC, cs.VIS, cs.SE, cs.DL, cs.DB. 

The paper discusses issues related to visual analytics, data quality, and deceptive design practices in charts and graphs. These topics are typically covered in the Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC) and Visualization (cs.VIS) sub-categories. The paper also proposes a methodology for automatically identifying potential issues in the visual encoding stage of analysis, which is related to software testing (cs.SE). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of deep learning (cs.DL) for identifying mirages in some cases, and the importance of data management (cs.DB) for ensuring data quality.
